page.title: 08MY SCHOOL_A PUPIL'S ACCOUNT
page.content: I NEARLY ALWAYS WALK TO SCHOOL WITH MY FRIENDS AND WHEN WE GET THERE WE PLAY IN THE PLAYGROUND . USUALLY WE PLAY STINGBALL, WHEN YOU HAVE TO GET ACROSS THE PLAYGROUND WITHOUT BEING HIT BY THE BALL. WHEN THE TEACHER COMES WE ALL GO IN AND SIT DOWN AND SHE CALLS THE REGISTER. SHE GETS VERY CROSS IF WE TALK WHILE SHE IS DOING IT. MOST OF US WEAR SCHOOL UNIFORM. THE GIRLS WEAR A GREEN CHECK DRESS IN SUMMER AND IN WINTER THEY WEAR A GREY SKIRT, A WHITE SHIRT, A GREEN TIE AND A GREEN PULLOVER. THE BOYS WEAR GREY TROUSERS IN WINTER AND GREY SHORTS IN SUMMER. OUR PLAYGROUND IS RATHER SMALL SO WE USUALLY PLAY ON THE GREEN AND OFTEN WE HAVE TO SHARE IT WITH PONIES AND COWS. WHEN WE LEAVE HALE SCHOOL MOST OF US GO TO THE BURGATE IN FORDINGBRIDGE.
